statements: SELECT * FROM noise_levels;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM noise_levels WHERE noise_level > 70;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM noise_levels WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(noise_level) AS avg_noise FROM noise_levels GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM noise_levels WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, noise_level FROM noise_levels WHERE noise_level > 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM noise_levels WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY noise_level ASC
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(noise_level) AS average_noise FROM noise_levels GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 100 ORDER BY average_noise DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM noise_levels ORDER BY location
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_points FROM noise_levels GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 50 ORDER BY data_points DESC
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas;
SELECT area_name, noise_level FROM UrbanAreas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas ORDER BY noise_level DESC;
SELECT area_name, sensor_name FROM UrbanAreas INNER JOIN Sensors ON UrbanAreas.sensor_id = Sensors.id;
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE id = 5;
SELECT area_name, noise_level FROM UrbanAreas WHERE noise_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, sensor_name FROM UrbanAreas JOIN Sensors ON UrbanAreas.sensor_id = Sensors.id;
SELECT * FROM noise_level_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM noise_level_sensors WHERE noise_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM noise_level_sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_readings WHERE noise_level < 30;
SELECT sensor_id, installation_date, status FROM sensor_metadata WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM noise_level_sensors ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM noise_level_sensors WHERE noise_level > 80;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, timestamp FROM noise_level_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Microphone' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT s.sensor_id, s.location, r.noise_level AS latest_reading FROM noise_level_sensors s JOIN sensor_readings r ON s.sensor_id = r.sensor_id GROUP BY s.sensor_id, s.location ORDER BY latest_reading DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.location, m.status AS sensor_status FROM noise_level_sensors s LEFT JOIN sensor_metadata m ON s.sensor_id = m.sensor_id WHERE m.installation_date <= '2022-03-01';
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM UrbanAreas;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, sensor_type FROM UrbanAreas JOIN Sensors ON UrbanAreas.area_id = Sensors.area_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM NoiseLevels WHERE noise_level > 80;
SELECT area_name, status_description, last_update FROM UrbanAreas JOIN MonitoringStatus ON UrbanAreas.area_id = MonitoringStatus.area_id WHERE MonitoringStatus.status_description = 'Normal';
SELECT * FROM UrbanAreas WHERE sensor_count > 10 ORDER BY area_name DESC
SELECT area_name, sensor_count FROM UrbanAreas WHERE monitoring_status = true
SELECT area_name, sensor_type FROM UrbanAreas INNER JOIN Sensors ON UrbanAreas.area_id = Sensors.area_id WHERE Sensors.sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY area_name LIMIT 5

SELECT UrbanAreas.area_name, Sensors.sensor_type, NoiseLevels.noise_level FROM UrbanAreas INNER JOIN Sensors ON UrbanAreas.area_id = Sensors.area_id INNER JOIN NoiseLevels ON Sensors.sensor_id = NoiseLevels.sensor_id WHERE NoiseLevels.noise_level > 70
SELECT area_name, status_description, last_update FROM UrbanAreas INNER JOIN MonitoringStatus ON UrbanAreas.area_id = MonitoringStatus.area_id ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT * FROM noise_sensor
SELECT sensor_name, noise_level FROM sensor_data
SELECT location_name FROM sensor_location
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM sensor_status ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT sensor_id, event_type, timestamp FROM sensor_history WHERE event_type = 'maintenance'
SELECT * FROM noise_sensor;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM noise_sensor WHERE noise_level > 70;
SELECT sensor_id, SUM(noise_level) AS total_noise FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_status.status FROM noise_sensor JOIN sensor_status ON noise_sensor.id = sensor_status.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_history.event_type FROM noise_sensor JOIN sensor_history ON noise_sensor.id = sensor_history.sensor_id WHERE sensor_history.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
